column4: can someone help a linux newb? i'm using ubuntu server (edgy) and i have rtorrent installed, when i log in and start rtorrent, it starts downloading the torrents in the watch-directory, but when i close my ssh client, rtorrent stops too - is there a way to have it running, although i'm not connected to the server via ssh?
if you run rtorrent in screen, you can detach it, log out, log back in, and reattach it.
